      • getBounds

        public Bounds getBounds()
        Calculates and returns the bounds of the sprite based on its position and size. It will account for rotation and scaling in its calculation.
        Returns:
        The bounds of this sprite.

      • spriteCollided

        public boolean spriteCollided(processing.core.PVector point)
        Checks if a given vector is over the sprite, essentially collision detection.
        Parameters:
        point - The point to check.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the given point is over the sprite
